Extended_Enterprise_AffiliationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Extended_Enterprise_AffiliationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Extended_Enterprise_AffiliationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies the Extended Enterprise Affiliation to update. Leave blank when adding.

Name of the Extended Enterprise Affiliation.

validation.validation: Enter another name because this one already exists.

Extended_Enterprise_Affiliation_Inactive.description: The Affiliation Inactive boolean inactivates the extended enterprise affiliation when true.

validation.validation: To inactivate an extended enterprise affiliation, ensure that it doesn’t have any: enabled extended enterprise learners, subordinate extended enterprise affiliations that are active, or in-progress Manage Extended Enterprise Learner events that propose an enabled extended enterprise learner.

Extended_Enterprise_Affiliation_Data.description: The Affiliation Inactive boolean inactivates the extended enterprise affiliation when true.

validation.validation: You can't specify an active extended enterprise affiliation with an inactive superior extended enterprise affiliation. Activate the superior extended enterprise affiliation or update the request to inactivate this subordinate extended enterprise affiliations.
